_a_pirates_treasure_map_description: Study a map to unearth two hidden treasure chests buried on a small island.
_an_ashen_pirates_treasure_map_descripti: Study a map to unearth two hidden treasure chests buried on a small island.
_a_pirates_riddle_quest_description: Solve a short riddle to uncover modest riches hidden on a large island.
_an_ashen_pirates_riddle_quest_descripti: Solve a short riddle to uncover modest riches hidden on a large island in the perilous Devil's Roar.
